description: AI站点处理器配置 - 支持远程更新
author: AI Shortcuts Team

sites.name: DeepSeek
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const textarea = document.querySelector('textarea'); if (!textarea) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } textarea.focus(); textarea.value = query; const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { textarea.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const enterEvent = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, location: 0, repeat: false, isComposing: false }); textarea.dispatchEvent(enterEvent); }, 100); }

sites.name: 问小白
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const textarea = document.querySelector('textarea'); if (!textarea) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } textarea.focus(); textarea.value = query; const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { textarea.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const enterEvent = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, location: 0, repeat: false, isComposing: false }); textarea.dispatchEvent(enterEvent); }, 100); }

sites.name: 秘塔AI
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const iframeUrl = window.frameElement ? window.frameElement.src : window.location.href; if (iframeUrl.includes('/search/')) { const recommendBox = document.querySelector('div.MuiBox-root.css-qtri4c'); if (recommendBox) { recommendBox.click(); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 500)); } } const textarea = document.querySelector('.search-consult-textarea'); if (!textarea) { console.error('未找到秘塔输入框'); return; } textarea.value = query; textarea.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); const enterEvent = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, bubbles: true }); textarea.dispatchEvent(enterEvent); window.parent.postMessage({ type: 'metaso_response', success: true }, '*'); }

sites.name: 文心一言
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const editableDiv = document.querySelector('.yc-editor'); if (!editableDiv) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } editableDiv.focus(); const p = document.querySelector('p.yc-editor-paragraph'); if (p) { p.innerHTML = ''; } const span = document.createElement('span'); span.setAttribute('data-lexical-text', 'true'); span.textContent = query; p.appendChild(span); const inputEvent = new InputEvent('input', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, inputType: 'insertText', data: query }); editableDiv.dispatchEvent(inputEvent); editableDiv.dispatchEvent(new Event('change', { bubbles: true })); const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { editableDiv.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); const maxAttempts = 5; let attempts = 0; const tryClick = () => { const sendButton = document.querySelector('#sendBtn'); if (sendButton && !sendButton.disabled) { sendButton.click(); return true; } attempts++; if (attempts < maxAttempts) { setTimeout(tryClick, 200); } else { console.error('达到最大尝试次数，按钮仍然被禁用'); } }; setTimeout(tryClick, 100); }

sites.name: 腾讯元宝
sites.searchHandler:
async function(query) { const editableDiv = document.querySelector('[contenteditable="true"]'); if (!editableDiv) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } editableDiv.focus(); const pElement = editableDiv.querySelector('p'); if (pElement) { pElement.innerText = query; } else { editableDiv.innerHTML = '

'; editableDiv.querySelector('p').innerText = query; } const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { editableDiv.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const enterEvent = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, location: 0, repeat: false, isComposing: false }); editableDiv.dispatchEvent(enterEvent); }, 100); }

sites.name: Google
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { console.log('Google站点使用URL查询，无需搜索处理器'); }

sites.name: ChatGPT
sites.searchHandler:
async function(query) { const editableDiv = document.querySelector('#prompt-textarea'); if (!editableDiv) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } editableDiv.focus(); const pElement = editableDiv.querySelector('p'); if (pElement) { pElement.innerText = query; } else { editableDiv.innerHTML = '

'; editableDiv.querySelector('p').innerText = query; } const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { editableDiv.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const sendButton = document.querySelector('button[data-testid="send-button"]'); if (sendButton && !sendButton.disabled) { sendButton.click(); } }, 100); }

sites.name: 豆包
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const textarea = document.querySelector('textarea[data-testid="chat_input_input"]'); if (!textarea) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } textarea.focus(); textarea.value = query; const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus', 'keydown', 'keyup', 'keypress']; events.forEach(eventName => { textarea.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); if (eventName.startsWith('key')) { textarea.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent(eventName, { key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, bubbles: true })); } }); }

sites.name: 通义千问
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const textarea = document.querySelector('textarea'); if (!textarea) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } textarea.focus(); textarea.value = query; const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { textarea.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const enterEvent = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, location: 0, repeat: false, isComposing: false }); textarea.dispatchEvent(enterEvent); }, 100); window.parent.postMessage({ type: 'message_received', originalType: 'tongyi' }, '*'); }

sites.name: Copilot
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const textArea = document.querySelector('textarea#userInput'); if (!textArea) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } textArea.focus(); textArea.value = query; const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { textArea.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const sendButton = document.querySelector('button[title="Submit message"]'); if (sendButton && !sendButton.disabled) { sendButton.click(); } else { console.error('未找到发送按钮或按钮被禁用'); } }, 100); }

sites.name: Claude
sites.searchHandler:
async function(query) { const editableDiv = document.querySelector('[contenteditable="true"]'); if (!editableDiv) { console.error('未找到输入框'); return; } editableDiv.focus(); const pElement = editableDiv.querySelector('p'); if (pElement) { pElement.innerText = query; } else { editableDiv.innerHTML = '

'; editableDiv.querySelector('p').innerText = query; } const events = ['input', 'change', 'blur', 'focus']; events.forEach(eventName => { editableDiv.dispatchEvent(new Event(eventName, { bubbles: true })); }); setTimeout(() => { const enterEvent = new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true, key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, location: 0, repeat: false, isComposing: false }); editableDiv.dispatchEvent(enterEvent); setTimeout(() => { const sendButtonSelectors = ['button[type="button"][aria-label="Send Message"]', 'button[aria-label="Send"]', 'button[data-testid="send-button"]', 'button:has(svg)']; for (const selector of sendButtonSelectors) { const sendButton = document.querySelector(selector); if (sendButton && !sendButton.disabled) { sendButton.click(); return; } } }, 200); }, 100); }

sites.name: POE
sites.searchHandler: async function(query) { const growingTextArea = document.querySelector('.GrowingTextArea_growWrap__im5W3'); if (!growingTextArea) { console.error('未找到输入框容器'); return; } growingTextArea.setAttribute('data-replicated-value', query); const textarea = growingTextArea.querySelector('textarea'); if (textarea) { textarea.value = query; textarea.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); } setTimeout(() => { const sendButton = document.querySelector('button[data-button-send="true"]'); if (sendButton && !sendButton.disabled) { sendButton.click(); } else { console.error('未找到发送按钮或按钮被禁用'); } }, 100); }
